content:
\bibitem{solat2024sharding}
        Siamak Solat.
        \newblock Sharding distributed databases: A critical review.
        \newblock {\em arXiv preprint arXiv:2404.04384}, 2024.

        \bibitem{Souli-JbaliHA19}
        Rahma Souli{-}Jbali, Minyar Sassi~Hidri, and Rahma Ben~Ayed.
        \newblock Dynamic-based clustering for replica placement in data grids.
        \newblock {\em International Journal of Service Science, Management,
                Engineering, and Technology}, 10(4):58--80, 2019.

        \bibitem{srinivasan2016aerospike}
        V~Srinivasan, Brian Bulkowski, Wei-Ling Chu, Sunil Sayyaparaju, Andrew Gooding,
        Rajkumar Iyer, Ashish Shinde, and Thomas Lopatic.
        \newblock Aerospike: Architecture of a real-time operational dbms.
        \newblock {\em Proceedings of the VLDB Endowment}, 9(13):1389--1400, 2016.

        \bibitem{sun2024management}
        Liru Sun.
        \newblock Management research of big data technology in financial
        decision-making of enterprise cloud accounting.
        \newblock {\em Journal of Information \& Knowledge Management}, 23(01):2350067,
        2024.

        \bibitem{riak2020}
        Ahmet~Ercan Topcu and Aimen~Mukhtar Rmis.
        \newblock Analysis and evaluation of the riak cluster environment in
        distributed databases.
        \newblock {\em Computer Standards \& Interfaces}, 72:103452, 2020.

        \bibitem{walsh2022data}
        Barry Walsh.
        \newblock Data ingestion for ai.
        \newblock In {\em Productionizing AI: How to Deliver AI B2B Solutions with
                Cloud and Python}, pages 75--107. 2022.

        \bibitem{wang2022latency}
        Zhenzhao Wang, Santosh Marella, Mak Inada, Pablo~Rodriguez Defino, Abhishek
        Jagannath, and Lohit VijayaRenu.
        \newblock Latency vs cost: Data ingestion options at twitter scale.
        \newblock In {\em IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data)}, pages
        223--227, 2022.

        \bibitem{zais40basics}
        Colonel~Mark Zais, Karl Aspelund, Mr~Pedro Cesar, Lopes Gerum, and Ms~Nishka
        Uberoi.
        \newblock The basics of big data modeling.
        \newblock {\em Big Data for Generals… and Everyone Else over 40}, page~33.

        \bibitem{zhang2024towards}
        Yingqiang Zhang, Xinjun Yang, Hao Chen, Feifei Li, Jiawei Xu, Jie Zhou, Xudong
        Wu, and Qiang Zhang.
        \newblock Towards a shared-storage-based serverless database achieving seamless
        scale-up and read scale-out.
        \newblock In {\em 2024 IEEE 40th International Conference on Data Engineering
                (ICDE)}, pages 5119--5131. IEEE, 2024.

        \bibitem{ZoghlamiHA15}
        Mohamed~Ali Zoghlami, Minyar Sassi~Hidri, and Rahma Bn~Ayed.
        \newblock A merging-based consensus-driven fuzzy clustering of distributed
        data.
        \newblock In {\em International Conference on Fuzzy Systems ({FUZZ-IEEE})},
        pages 1--6, 2015.

        \bibitem{ZoghlamiHA16}
        Mohamed~Ali Zoghlami, Minyar Sassi~Hidri, and Rahma Bn~Ayed.
        \newblock Sampling-based consensus fuzzy clustering on big data.
        \newblock In {\em International Conference on Fuzzy Systems ({FUZZ-IEEE})},
        pages 1501--1508, 2016.

        \bibitem{ZoghlamiHA17}
        Mohamed~Ali Zoghlami, Minyar Sassi~Hidri, and Rahma Bn~Ayed.
        \newblock Consensus-driven cluster analysis: Top-down and bottom-up based
        split-and-merge classifiers.
        \newblock {\em Int. J. Artif. Intell. Tools}, 26(4), 2017.

        \bibitem{zschornig2017personal}
        Theo Zsch{\"o}rnig, Robert Wehlitz, and Bogdan Franczyk.
        \newblock A personal analytics platform for the internet of things-implementing
        kappa architecture with microservice-based stream processing.
        \newblock In {\em International Conference on Enterprise Information Systems},
        volume~2, pages 733--738, 2017.
